abstract: Rev J F Flannelly lauds Roosevelt's and Pope's peace efforts
snippet: A special Holy Hour Service marking the close of the old year was observed last night at St. Patrick's ' Cathedral. Presiding during the hour of adoration was the Most Rev. Francis J. Spellman, Archbishop of New York, who also officiated at Benedi...

headline.main: SERVICE USHERS IN 1940 AT CATHEDRAL; Archbishop Spellman Presides at Holy Hour Devotions in St. Patrick's PRESIDENT PRAISED HIGHLY Father Flannelly Finds Plea Reveals an Understanding of Pope's Message

lead_paragraph: A special Holy Hour Service marking the close of the old year was observed last night at St. Patrick's ' Cathedral. Presiding during the hour of adoration was the Most Rev. Francis J. Spellman, Archbishop of New York, who also officiated at Benediction of the Blessed Sacrament after the Holy Hour service. The Rev. Joseph F. Flannelly, administrator of the cathedral, preached the sermon.
